Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
Description:
Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448
GA date: June CY2024
